text: Adam Nathaniel Yauch (August 5, 1964 - May 4, 2012) was an American rapper and movie director. He was a member of the Beastie Boys. Yauch was born in Brooklyn, New York City. In 2009, he was diagnosed with salivary gland neoplasm. He died of the disease in New York City. == References == Category:1964 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American rappers Category:Deaths from salivary gland cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Musicians from Brooklyn
title: Adam Yauch
